entry.string: oc process -f https://raw.githubusercontent.com/sogis/pipelines/master/api_webgisclient/qgis-server-featureinfo/deployment/deploymentconfig.yaml -p NAMESPACE=gdi-production -p TAG=2.0.17 -p REPLICAS=2 -p CPU_REQUEST=1000m -p CPU_LIMIT=1000m -p MEMORY_REQUEST=2048Mi -p MEMORY_LIMIT=2500Mi -p ENVIRONMENT=-prod | oc apply -n gdi-production -f- oc rollout latest -n gdi-production qgis-server-featureinfo oc rollout status -n gdi-production dc qgis-server-featureinfo
